EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Introducing the Java DSL for Spring Integration. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, January 27, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e8a2539a6f51c2b0b9d3fb7e2b3a170ed>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 665 007 491
Thank you,
